Complimentary makeovers demos for customers can be done on a walk-in basis, or you can call ahead for an appointment. Some stores offer various complimentary services for purchases you make. For example, if you purchase false eyelashes, some MAC stores will trim and fit them for you. Not all MAC stores offer complimentary makeover demos, so a quick phone call can determine if the store offers demos and if there is any related purchase requirement.
